nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You see all the gingerbread people in line ready to gamble away their chocolate chips. Nature is healing.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I can already feel the sweet taste of victory.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: It’s 5 o’clock, time to spill the tea. Have you got something?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: Did you know that {fighterA} is a fraud because I have heard rumours that they getting expired and you can see some mold on their body.

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: The gingerbread gambler returns to mumbling to himself.
